Redefining 'lightweight' for JavaScript Libraries
What?
Minified is a client-side JavaScript library, comparable to jQuery and MooTools in scope. It helps you with DOM manipulation, animation, events and AJAX stuff in the browser.
Why?

Minified is smaller!

Minified is a sub-4kb JavaScript library for client-side scripting. It is fully-featured and comparable to jQuery and MooTools, but its file size is over 85% smaller.

Easy to learn!

Minified has relatively few, but very powerful functions. There's no need to wade through two dozens pages filled with functions to find something.

No surprises!

Minified has no polyfills and does not try too hard to hide browser differences. Your JavaScript can, for better or worse, work with the same features as your HTML.

Getting Started

Check out the How to... and the API docs to explore Minified on your own. Or go to this presentation or the Tutorial for some more guidance.

Finally, here are a few JSFiddle example to get you started: Animation, Animation Loops

Have fun!
